meanings.definition: To restore a deleted file or data.
meanings.sent1: I accidentally deleted my essay, but I was able to undelete it.
meanings.sent2: She quickly undeleted the important email before it was lost forever.
meanings.sent3: After realizing his mistake, he frantically tried undeleting the document.
meanings.sent4: Undeleting the photo felt like bringing a lost memory back to life.
meanings.sent5: The software's feature to undelete files saved me from losing all my work.

meanings.definition: The act of recovering a deleted item from a computer or digital device.
meanings.sent1: I used undeleting to retrieve the file I accidentally erased.
meanings.sent2: The technician performed an undeleting to recover the lost data.
meanings.sent3: Witnessing the undeleting process was like watching a digital magician at work.
meanings.sent4: The undeleting of the file was like finding a hidden treasure in the computer.
meanings.sent5: The importance of undeleting became clear when I almost lost all my photos.
